document.full_text: the northern region of puntland has suspended a deal with the south african mercenary firm saracen international to train an antipiracy force, two government officials said thursday.
document.title: africa: somalia: puntland drops deal with mercenary firm
lines_and_colors: the northern region of puntland has suspended a deal with the south african mercenary firm saracen international to train an antipiracy force, two government officials said thursday.
